sentences.en: How can we take their experiences as veridical reports of the afterlife?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么能把他们的体验当作,对来生的真实报告呢

sentences.en: Reassuringly, my dog appears to share my veridical view of reality: she chases the ball and triumphantly catches it between her jaws.
sentences.cn: 让人欣慰的是，我的那只狗的出现，把我带回了现实：她追赶着那只球，用下巴衔着，以胜利者的姿态，把球捡了回来。

sentences.en: The victim is willing and able to provide veridical testimony.
sentences.cn: 受害者愿意并且能够真实地作证.
